Class Box

  • java.lang.Object
    • Box

  • class Box
extends java.lang.Object
    A shape of a rectangle that can be drawn in its Panel2D parentPanel.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Box(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int pixelsIndex, int colorsIndex)
      Create an instance of a rectangle shape and set up a formula to conrol its movement for animation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw()
      Draws this rectangle shape in its parentPanel.
      void moveCorners(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
      Translates (moves) the two corner points of this box.
      void setParent(Panel2D parentPanel)
      Set the parentPanel to draw inside for later.
      void update()
      This method changes the direction of motion of each corner point if near the edge of the display.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Box

        Box(int x1,
    int y1,
    int x2,
    int y2,
    int pixelsIndex,
    int colorsIndex)
        Create an instance of a rectangle shape and set up a formula to conrol its movement for animation.
        Parameters:
        x1 - Horizontal position of the top-left corner.
        y1 - Vertical position of the top-left corner.
        x2 - Horizontal position of the bottom-right corner.
        y2 - Vertical position of the bottom-right corner.
        pixelsIndex - The index of the character used to draw the rectangle.
        colorsIndex - The index of the colour used to draw the rectangle.

    • Method Detail

      • setParent

        public void setParent(Panel2D parentPanel)
        Set the parentPanel to draw inside for later.
        Parameters:
        parentPanel - An instance of a Panel2D to be used for drawing inside later.

      • moveCorners

        public void moveCorners(int x1,
                        int y1,
                        int x2,
                        int y2)
        Translates (moves) the two corner points of this box.
        Parameters:
        x1 - The horizontal amount of translation to the top left corner.
        y1 - The vertical amount of translation to the top left corner.
        x2 - The horizontal amount of translation to the bottom right corner.
        y2 - The vertical amount of translation to the bottom right corner.

      • update

        public void update()
        This method changes the direction of motion of each corner point if near the edge of the display. Then it changes the position of each corner point by a small amount so that this shape seems to "move" for animation.

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Draws this rectangle shape in its parentPanel.
